attributes.description: Default value set in a template, and present in an operational template. Generally limited to leaf and near-leaf nodes.
attributes.name: default_value

functions.meaning: True if any value (i.e. instance) of the reference model type would be allowed. Redefined in descendants.
functions.name: any_allowed

functions.meaning: True if `_a_value_` is valid with respect to constraint expressed in concrete instance of this type.
functions.name: valid_value

functions.meaning: Generate a prototype value from this constraint object.
functions.name: prototype_value

functions.meaning: True if there is an assumed value.
functions.name: has_default_value

meta_info.description: Abstract parent type of `C_OBJECT` subtypes that are defined by value, i.e. whose definitions are actually in the archetype rather than being by reference.
meta_info.name: C_DEFINED_OBJECT
